page.title: 12THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE
page.content: The orange buses of {CARDIFF CITY {TRANSPORT }are responsible for the service in our survey area. Trowbridge is connected to the city centre by the 62,65.The 61 also serves Trowbridge, but this is a cross city service to Pentrebane.Rumney is also served by these buses as well as the 60.The service is usually every 15 minutes. Llanrumney Estate is served by the 47,48 from the city centre. The 19 will also take you to the outskirts of the area.This is a cross city service connecting with Ely.At peak times the 49 a commutabus also runs.Llanrumney buses are usually every 10 minutes. Llanedeyrn and Pentwyn are mainly served by the 57 and 58 from the city centre every 15 minutes.During the day the 51,52 and 56 from Fairwater and a 59 commutabus also serve Llanedeyrn.
